name: DTApplicationUpdateManager
summary: A simple manager which checks if there is any newer app's version available in the AppStore.
description: Whenever you roll out a new version to the AppStore, you might want the user to update to that newly released version. DTApplicationUpdateManager helps to let the app notified about the new version. If the uesr ignored that version, DTApplicationUpdateManager is still able to remind in the next time in a flexible way.
